text: Hello.  Are you willing to donate to Save the Children charity from your pyament from this task?
Hello, yes I am willing to donate my payment from this task for the Save the Children charity
It is a good charity and i is international.  How about donating the entore $2.  Every bit helps?
I have no problem donating the entire $2, and I agree, every bit does help!
To be clear, how much are you willing to donate?
All of my payment, the entire $2.
Good.  It is for a great cause.  Right?
Anything that helps children succeed is definitely a great cause
Does it make you happy when you give to charity?
Always. I set aside a small personal charity fund each year so that I can contribute to my community.
What other charities do you give to?
The Red Cross and Greenpeace were my main charity donations this year
Would like to receive a thank you from Save the Children?
Aww, that would be so considerate of them! Yes I would.
Would you like one the children to send you a letter and picture?
That would be so sweet of them. If a child would like to send me a letter and picture of theirselves, I would be delighted.
Are you still comfortable giving all the money from this task to Save the Children?
Yes I am, thank you for asking.
Will you give $2.00 from your earnings from this task to Save the Chidren charity?
Yes I will give my earnings to the Save the Children charity.
